attributes.description:
Finance can be arranged, Excludes administration, delivery and license registration fees, 80 point quality check, Very neat, Trade-ins accepted, Test drives welcome, Nationwide delivery.

Finance is available with all the major banks as we are approved dealers. Please come and visit our Used Car Manager and our Business Manager, they will be able to arrange a Taylor made Deal structure to match your pocket over a lovely cup of coffee at our Bistro. Trade-ins welcome and we pay top prices for good clean vehicles. First time to finance, our Finance and Insurance Manager will assist you step by step throughout your process. There are great warranty options available for this vehicle and other great products. Should you require further information or you would like to arrange a test drive please do not hesitate to contact us at Motus Toyota Bryanston.

attributes.description: Welcome to the world of the New Renault Kwid which features a host of new styling, design and safety features. The New Kwid becomes more modern and assertive; the new front fascia exudes a sense of aggression which is nowhere to be found amongst its competition. The Kwid’s sleek style is underlined by new Signature Ornate Lighting. The SUV-styled headlamps and silver streak LED DRLs create a striking impression. At the rear, tail lamps with LED light guides leave a distinct trail. The exterior design is further enhanced with the new boomerang shaped sculpted roof with arching roof rails. The stylish new grille and its imposing front adds prominence to the Kwid’s renowned SUV-look, while the new 14” multi-spoke wheels with a high 180mm ground clearance further accentuate the SUV stance. The New Kwid also comes with SUV-styled skid plates that prevent damage to the under body on rough terrain, ensuring a hassle-free drive and complete peace-of-mind. Go ahead, make it happen

attributes.description:
This 2016 TOYOTA HILUX 2.8 GD-6 RAIDER 4X4 A/T P/U D/C is available on sale for R579,995 it has a AUTOMATIC transmission and is a perfect DOUBLE CAB for your daily driving pleasure. It has BLACK Interior and a beautiful GREY colour. The vehicle has only driven 90000km and is still in great condition.
Extra Details Include:
   OPTIONAL EXTRAS WORTH OVER 100K!!! THE REAL SAFARI EDITION!!! REPLACEMENT BUMPER!!! CATTLE RAILS!!! 2X SPARE WHEELS!!! SAFARI SEAT COVERS!!! SPOT LIGHTS!!! SNORKEL!!! TOW BAR!!! OFF ROAD MAGS AND TYRES!!! WHEEL ARCHES AND SIDE STEPS!!! FULL FRANCHISE SERVICE HISTORY AT TOYOTA!!! ACCIDENT FREE!!! MUST BE SEEN BEAUTY!!! A BARGAIN OF A LIFETIME!!! FIRST TO SEE WILL BUY!!!

attributes.description:
At Kia Alberton, we pride ourselves on delivering high quality pre-owned vehicles. All our vehicles undergo a thorough 125-point quality check, roadworthy and valet.  

The one thing we pride ourselves in more than anything is EXCELLENT CUSTOMER SERVICE. When buying a vehicle from us, you join the Kia Alberton Family and family look after each other. We will structure a package that will not only suit your needs but your pocket too.   

Call now and one of our experienced Sales Executives will gladly bring the vehicle out to you or welcome you to our showroom to view and test drive the vehicle. 

Finance can be arranged through all major financial institutions, nationwide delivery available and all trade-ins accepted subject to view. Price excludes on the road fees.
